preview.name: Inlet concentration of A
preview.description: Molar concentration of reactant A in the feed entering the reactor.

preview.name: Reaction rate constant of first reaction
preview.description: First-order rate constant for the conversion of A to intermediate B.

preview.name: Reaction rate constant of second reaction
preview.description: First-order rate constant for the conversion of intermediate B to product C.

preview.name: Residence time
preview.description: Mean residence time of fluid elements in the reactor, defined as reactor volume divided by volumetric flow rate.

preview.name: Reactor volume
preview.description: Volume of the continuous stirred tank reactor.
Sequential first-order reaction scheme showing reactant A converting to intermediate B with rate constant k1, then B to product C with rate constant k2.
Definition of the reactor mean residence time τ as the reactor volume V divided by volumetric flow rate F.
Rate expression for the first reaction step A→B following first-order kinetics with rate constant k1.
Rate expression for the second reaction step B→C following first-order kinetics with rate constant k2.

preview.latex: F\,(C_{i0} - C_i) + V\,(\text{rate of generation of }i) = 0
preview.description: General steady-state material balance for species i in the CSTR equating inflow minus outflow and generation rate to zero.
